body.name: Blue Diamond Gold 8" Frying Pan Skillet Ceramic Nonstick, PFOA Free, Induction Suitable, Dishwasher Safe, Gold Handle, Black
features: TOXIN-FREE: This collection’s healthy ceramic nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium.
60% TOUGHER COATING: The extraordinary diamond-infused coating is metal utensil safe and enhanced to provide strength, scratch-resistance and last even longer than our original nonstick.
50% MORE DURABLE: The durable aluminum construction prevents these pans from breaking down, degrading, or chipping.
2X LONGER LASTING: Built for daily life, these high-quality pans stay looking great and performing even better for years to come.
GORGEOUS GOLD-TONE HANDLES: The riveted stainless steel handles come in a striking gold-tone hue with wear-and corrosion-resistant ceramic coating.
VERSATILE COOKING: Oven and broiler safe up to 600°F with induction ready bases suitable for all stovetops, including induction.
90% MORE DISHWASHER RESILIENT: This collection is designed to be extra tough and ultra-dishwasher safe for an effortless cleanup.
body.description: When it comes to quick-heating pans that deliver effortless release and professional results, go for the gold! This 10” frypan from the Blue Diamond Gold Collection is suitable for all stovetops, including induction, and the gold-tone handles add an eye-catching flair. Our diamond-infused coating delivers 5x more strength and lasts 10x longer than conventional coatings making it perfect for everyday use. Plus, our ceramic nonstick coating is not only infused with diamonds for extra durability, but is PFAS-free for healthier, worry-free meals. Dishwasher safe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BLUE DIAMOND GOLD ENHANCED CERAMIC NONSTICK COOKWARE

THE GOLD STANDARD IN NONSTICK! BLUE DIAMOND GOLD COOKWARE Blue Diamond Gold is a our most cutting-edge collection of nonstick cooking tools that deliver incomparable release, ultra-fast heating, and incredible results. It’s everything you’ve come to expect from Blue Diamond and more! Plus, our ceramic nonstick coating is not only infused with diamonds for extra durability, but is PFAS-free for healthier, stress-free meals.

Previous page MADE FOR DAILY LIFE 50% MORE DURABLE Ready for any meal, this collection won’t break down, degrade, or chip for cookware you can trust BUILT TO LAST 60% TOUGHER COATING The gold diamond-infused coating provides strength, scratch-resistance, and a sparkling kitchen TAKE THEM ANYWHERE VERSATILE DESIGN These pots and pans are oven safe up to 600°F and suitable for all stovetops, including induction STAINLESS STEEL STYLE GOLD-TONE HANDLES Riveted stainless steel handles come in a gold-tone hue with wear-and corrosion-resistant coating PAINLESS CLEANUP 90% DISHWASHER RESILIENCE Designed to be extra tough and ultra-dishwasher safe for an effortless cleanup Next page 1 DURABLE CONSTRUCTION 2 ENHANCED WITH DIAMONDS 3 VERSATILE DESIGN 4 GOLD-TONE HANDLES 5 DISHWASHER SAFE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You won't regret purchasing this!
reviews.reviewText: These pots are so great! They are the best nonstick pots I've had in a while. I haven't had anything to yet stick to them. They are safe in the dishwasher and clean very easily. Plus, the color is so beautiful. I get so many compliments when people come over. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and looks!
reviews.reviewText: This set is so pretty and easy to work with! I love the colors and it's so light and easy to use and wash. The price is great for the amount that you get! It's hard to find pans with gold and I’m so glad I found these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great set but the handles
reviews.reviewText: I want to give these a 4.5 but that isn’t an option. The cookware is great quality, extremely easy to clean and really durable. My only complaint is that the handles don’t always stay cool. I have used each pot in various cooking methods over the last three weeks and at least three times I’ve touched a handle that was too warm when it shouldn’t have been.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large size = better control
reviews.reviewText: After using this to brown hamburger I came to understand the benefits of its size. More room allows for separation and flipping of meat and it browns more easily. High sides keep food in the pan. Before this, I was using a smaller skillet and when I'd stir the meat I'd lose some over the edge. My skills improved 100% using this pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, this cooking set!
reviews.reviewText: Not only are they pretty, but they are durable and so easy to clean. Everything rinses is right out, no sticking cooks evenly so far I’m very impressed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Green Pan dupe
reviews.reviewText: I got a set of green pan brand pans as a gift and wanted a high wall pan but didn’t want to drop a couple hundred on it. This is a great dupe, and while it doesn’t perfectly match the rest of my set, it’s pretty darn close. Nonstick coating has been flawless so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the worst nonstick pan I have ever had. The center was raised so everything went immediately onto the sides. After 4 or 5 uses it started sticking in several places and my utensils couldn’t even turn an egg over without destroying it. Not sure if it was a one time anomaly or if the product was just inferior (but the price was not!) I never washed it in the dishwasher or used sharp utensils in it. It’s frustrating to pay so much and get a product that never performed right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best no stick surface!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best no stick surface. It's very durable. I recommend it to everyone. If you are looking for a good priced cookware with great quality you should get blue diamond! Cleans like a dream. Heats very evenly with the double bottom. Looks great fir a long time.
